panel.label: Informazioni
panel.name: support_panel
panel.text: Per le ultime informazioni su Firestorm, visitare http://www.firestormviewer.org

panel.label: Ringraziamenti

panel.text:
Firestorm would not be possible without the decision from Linden Lab to make their Second Life viewer source code available.
